scripts.build: npm run init-build-dir && node tsconfig && browserify --entry src/app.ts -p tsify -o .generated/bundle.js
scripts.build-min: npm run init-build-dir && npm run build && node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs --compress -o .generated/bundle.js .generated/bundle.js
scripts.watch: npm run init-build-dir && watchify src/app.ts -p tsify --debug -v -o .generated/bundle.js
